column4: Is it legal to install w32codecs for someone who has a Windows license?
it's illegal to use w32codecs in the us regardless
i'm trying to get my dad, who has a computer shop, to start offering ubuntu
so i'm trying to figure out how to get the most multimedia support legally for his customers
dont try to be "the good guy" and go by the MPAA's laws.
if you want a good system, use it
i'm not talking about me. i've got all the codecs installed
nobody will know they have it. it's not like theyre going to get tasered and throwin into jail for having w32codecs installed
i agree but he doesn't want to take the chance
there's a 0% chance it will happen.
it's stupid to not install them
maybe you should talk to him. please, please talk to him
